title: mondaysRmurder 2 Episode 4: The Bizarre Death of Jonathan Luna
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: When I hear the bell on Monday morning I hope it's you with another interesting case. However, I always feel bad for the victims loved ones, I can't imagine how awful it would be to lose someone this way.

I have never heard about this case despite living in the area and traveling many of the same roads on occasion.  Definitely murder...the slashes to the scrotum make it sound like someone may have thought he lacked balls...idk...very chilling.
description:
mondaysRmurder 2 Episode 4: The Bizarre Death of Jonathan Luna

If you have information about the bizarre death of Jonathan Luna, call local authorities or Pennsylvania Crime Stoppers at 1-800-4-PA-TIPS. There is a $100,000 reward for information on this case.
